author: Spencer Kimball
title: 'There's a shortage of everything': Pharmacies struggle to meet demand as coronavirus surges in NYC
description: The surge in demand is straining supply chains and leading to shortages of basic medications like Tylenol and the antibiotic Zithromax Z-pak.
content:
Emanuel Simhayev, owner and pharmacist at Get Well Rx in Astoria, Queens, consults with a customer purchasing face masks. April 2, 2020
Emanuel Simhayev's small pharmacy is short-staffed these days.
Most of his employees, worried about getting exposed to th… [+9442 chars]
